name: dom-toolkit
description: DOM操作工具集 - 坐标检测、元素交互、页面滚动

scripts.build:modules: npm run build:coordinate && npm run build:detector && npm run build:interactor && npm run build:scroller
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:inject && npm run build:modules
scripts.test:
echo "请选择测试类型:
1. 接口测试: tests/interface-test.html
2. 完整功能测试: tests/full-test.html
3. 滚动专项测试: tests/scroll-test.html" && open tests/interface-test.html
scripts.test:interface: echo "打开接口测试页面" && open tests/interface-test.html
scripts.test:full: echo "打开完整功能测试页面" && open tests/full-test.html
scripts.test:scroll: echo "打开滚动专项测试页面" && open tests/scroll-test.html
